meanings.definition: The act of making something concrete or real.
meanings.sent1: The concretization of his dream into a successful business was inspiring.
meanings.sent2: The concretization of the plan helped everyone understand what needed to be done.
meanings.sent3: The concretization of her wild imagination into a colorful painting made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The concretization of his thoughts into words painted a vivid picture in the reader's mind.
meanings.sent5: The concretization of the concept made it easier for students to grasp.

meanings.definition: The process of giving definite form or shape to something.
meanings.sent1: Through careful concretization, the idea transformed into a practical solution.
meanings.sent2: The concretization of the design turned it into a beautiful sculpture.
meanings.sent3: The concretization of the recipe made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The concretization of the project plan gave it a clear direction.
meanings.sent5: The concretization of the concept brought it to life.

meanings.definition: The act of representing abstract ideas in a concrete or tangible form.
meanings.sent1: His concretization of complex theories into simple models helped students understand better.
meanings.sent2: The concretization of emotions into music can evoke powerful feelings.
meanings.sent3: The concretization of his daydreams into a comic book was unexpected but delightful.
meanings.sent4: The concretization of her memories into a photo album captured precious moments.
meanings.sent5: The concretization of the concept made it more relatable to the audience.
